author: ngn
msg: Adding a setting to disconnect a user after a certain amount of failure login attempts (FTPSERVER-94). Also added a configurable delay after a failed login to make brute force attacks harder (FTPSERVER-99).

author: snicoll
msg: Fixed the name of the test to exclude.

author: mwebb
msg: initial creation.  This was written in response to JIRA #389

author: olegk
msg: Removed ChannelAdaptor, which makes impossible optimized inter-channel data transfer using FileChannel#transferFrom() and FileChannel#transferTo()
